conformance.naming

Class CreationTest.CreationTestStorageServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • conformance.naming.TestStorageServer
      • conformance.naming.CreationTest.CreationTestStorageServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command, Storage
    Enclosing class:
    CreationTest

    private class CreationTest.CreationTestStorageServer
extends TestStorageServer
    Storage server for the creation test.

    This storage server waits for calls to create on its command interface. If an expected call is received, it wakes any thread that may be blocked in testFileCreation. If no such call is expected, or the call is received with the wrong argument, the server fails the test.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public boolean create(Path file)
        Checks that the naming server has commanded the correct file to be created, if such a command is expected.
        Specified by:
        create in interface Command
        Overrides:
        create in class TestStorageServer
        Parameters:
        file - Path to the file to be created. The parent directory will be created if it does not exist. This path may not be the root directory.
        Returns:
        true if the file is created; false if it cannot be created.
